title: "Package index"
---

```{r, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  echo = FALSE,
  message = FALSE,
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"
)
```

Overriding the default pkgdown "Reference" just to show how you might do it.

```{r setup}
library(dverse)

universe <- c("dverse")
url_template <- "https://maurolepore.github.io/{package}/reference/{topic}.html"
docs <- document_universe(universe, url_template)
```

## All funcitons

```{r}
DT::datatable(
  docs[c("topic", "title")],
  escape = FALSE,
  rownames = NULL,
  options = list(
    # f: filter, t: table, i: information
    dom = "fti",
    search = list(search = "document")
  )
)
```
